OrderItemRateCardEntry.name: OrderItemRateCardEntry
OrderItemRateCardEntry.description: Represents the catalog and negotiated rates of a usage metric associated with an order item that's used to charge overage consumption.

IsChosenRate.description: Indicates whether this rate is the chosen rate for the associated binding target and usage resource (true) or not (false). The default value is false. Available in API version 64.0 and later.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to the order item rate card entry record.

NegotiatedRate.description: The base negotiated rate used to charge overage consumption.

OrderItemId.description: The parent order item associated with the order item rate card entry.

RateCardEntryId.description: The rate card entry containing catalog rates that's associated with the order item rate card entry.

RateCardId.description: The rate card associated with the order item rate card entry.

RateUnitOfMeasureId.description: The standard unit of measure containing the unit for the negotiated rate that's associated with the order item rate card entry.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource associated with the order item rate card entry.
